plugin.title: Livestream
plugin.author: Bits on the Run
plugin.description: This plugin can automatically poll and kick in a livestream.

flashvar.name: file
flashvar.description: Name of the FLV file to load.

flashvar.name: image
flashvar.description: Preview image associated with the live stream. It is shown when the live stream ends.

flashvar.name: interval
flashvar.description: Interval in seconds for polling if the livestream is there.

flashvar.name: message
flashvar.description: Message to show when polling the livestream

flashvar.name: streamer
flashvar.description: RTMP server to pull the stream from.
